item.description:
If you have ever had your leaves read it can be quite entertaining.  Groupon has a deal but you have to act fast.  The date can be changed and once we have a headcount we will have to make some appointments so the time might change but we will work that out as a group.  This seems like a great event to have a reading, then have lunch, and compare notes.

If you're interested get a Groupon and let's try this!

 

Here is the link: http://www.groupon.com/deals/the-original-tremont-tearoom-5?utm_campaign=UserReferral&utm_medium=email&utm_source=uu4440570

 

$29 is cheap!

Spiritualists help demystify the present and future with sessions such as tarot readings, mediumships, and psychometries

  • Expires Jul 3, 2013
  • Limit 1 per person, may buy 2 additional as gifts. Limit 1 per visit. Valid only for option purchased. Appointment required. Same-day reading not guaranteed for late arrivals. Valid for in-person or phone readings.

group.name: 40/50 Something Year Olds - Men & Women Social Networking

item.name: What's your future - read your fortune at the original Tremont Tearoom downtown
